extends.description: extend an array of existing configuration

rules.description: rules determine what the linter looks for and complains about

plugins.description: rules or sets of rules built by the community that support methodologies, toolsets, non-standard CSS features, or very specific use cases.

processors.description: are functions that hook into stylelint pipeline, modifying code on its way into stylelint and modifying results on their way out.

ignoreFiles.description: a glob or array of globs to ignore specific files

defaultSeverity.description: the default severity level for all rules that do not have a severity specified in their secondary options.

configFile.description: path to a JSON, YAML, or JS file that contains your stylelint configuration object.

formatter.description: Specify the formatter that you would like to use to format your results

syntax.description: Force a specific non-standard syntax that should be used to parse source stylesheets

fix.description: If true, stylelint will fix as many errors as possible
